definition[0]: to hit someone with the flat part of your hand
example[0]: Sarah slapped Aaron across the face.
definition[1]: to put something down on a surface with force, especially when you are angry
example[1]: Giles slapped his cards down on the table.
definition[2]: to hit a surface with a lot of force, making a loud sharp sound
example[2]: Small waves slapped against the side of the boat.
definition[3]: a quick hit with the flat part of your hand
example[3]: Julia gave Roy a slap on the cheek.
